column1: Wind speed will be (40-50) kmph gusting up to 60 kmph.
These sea areas will be rough at times.
Wind speed will be (50-60) kmph gusting up to 70 kmph.
These sea areas will be very rough.  Naval and multi-day fishing communities are
advised not to venture into these sea areas.
Wind speed will be (60-70) kmph gusting up to 80 kmph.
These sea areas will be very rough.  Naval and multi-day fishing communities are
advised not to venture into these sea areas.
